attributes.action: Drummer Lee Rigby to be awarded the V.C.
attributes.additional_details:
The Victoria Cross is the highest military decoration that can be awarded to any member of the armed forces.

It stands for "valour" in the face of the enemy.

In my true opinion Drummer Lee Rigby. Deserves this pinnacle of British honours.

Please please sign so Lee will never be forgotten..

Thank you.
